spec_data.Name: perl-Safe-Isa
spec_data.Description:
This module allows you to call isa, can, does and DOES safely on things that
may not be objects, without the risk of crashing.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 03 Oct 2017 07:31:48 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Call isa, can, does and DOES safely on things that may not be objects
